channel.title: CVE Feed for Scott Paterson -- Time Clock Pro
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Scott Paterson -- Time Clock Pro

item.title: CVE-2024-9593|2024-10-18T18:56:31.697Z -- scott%20paterson -- time%20clock%20pro
item.description: The Time Clock plugin and Time Clock Pro plugin for WordPress are vulnerable to Remote Code Execution in versions up to, and including, 1.2.2 (for Time Clock) and 1.1.4 (for Time Clock Pro) via the 'etimeclockwp_load_function_callback' function. This allows unauthenticated attackers to execute code on the server. The invoked function's parameters cannot be specified.

item.title: CVE-2024-9593|2024-10-18T17:32:30.648Z -- scott%20paterson -- time%20clock%20pro
item.description: The Time Clock plugin and Time Clock Pro plugin for WordPress are vulnerable to Remote Code Execution in versions up to, and including, 1.2.2 (for Time Clock) and 1.1.4 (for Time Clock Pro) via the 'etimeclockwp_load_function_callback' function. This allows unauthenticated attackers to execute code on the server. The invoked function's parameters cannot be specified.
